name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Power Bill Buddy - Time-of-Use Demand Charge

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save on Power bills with Power Bill Buddy: it displays time-of-use rates and demand charges for your utility.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save on Power bills with Power Bill Buddy: it displays time-of-use rates and demand charges for your utility, and helps you optimize your power bill. PG&E and SCE currently supported. To request more utilities please write to hello [at] sunboxlabs.com
